alert.note: Alert for Dinwiddie; Eastern Chesterfield (Including Col. Heights); Eastern Hanover; Eastern Henrico; Western Chesterfield; Western Henrico (Including the City of Richmond); Western King William; Western King and Queen (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued December 24 at 6:46AM EST until December 24 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 10 below zero. * WHERE...Portions of central, east central and south central Virginia. * WHEN...Until 10 AM EST this morning. * IMPACTS...A Wind Chill Advisory means that very cold air and strong winds will combine to generate low wind chills. This will result in frost bite and lead to hypothermia if precautions are not taken. If you must venture outdoors...make sure you wear a hat and gloves.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
